boosterDaily: 'cause ye be a booster, ye receive double the normal rewards! Arr matey
noItemProvided: What exactly are ye lookin' to plunder, matey?
unknownColor: Ahoy! I don't recognize the color {color}. Make sure ye choose a c'rrect color from \` +shop colors\`!
notEnoughCurrency: 'ay, ye don't 'ave enough {currency} fer that there!
channelPurchaseSuccess: Ye looted yer own personal channel! Ye can edit yer channel 'ere: {channelLink}
bugNoArguments:
Yarrr, I need more infermation.
Fer instance, I need to know how the bug happened, and what role and game it was spotted.
If ye have any photos ye want to contribute, submit yer logs with the infermation above. Then find the URL and share yer findings with us.
bugNoGameServer: Ye shouldn't attach yer image in the game server! Use the link below to add yer attachments.
bugSuccess:
Yer bug is successfully logged! Any extra infermation should go here.
{url}
suggestNoArguments:
Yarrr, I need more infermation.
Fer instance, I need to know how ye want to improve the server or why yer idea is a good idea. Don't ferget to mention the difference between yer idea and the server as it is now!
If ye have any photos ye want to contribute, submit yer logs with the infermation above. Then find the URL and share yer findings with us.
suggestNoGameServer: Images attached to a suggestion from the game server cannot be submitted! Please use the link below to add yer attachments.
suggestSuccess:
Yer suggestion been sent! Please provide any screenshots or more information 'ere:
{url}
timeNoDuration: I need a time ye landlubber.
specialRoleMissing: Ye be missing the special role. If ye aren't, log it using `+bug`.
colorNotSpecified: Ye be missing a color, landlubber.
nameInvalid: Arrrr, that name is invalid ye landlubber.
nameSuccess: Done! yer special role's name been changed to {name}.
profileNeedToBuy: Ye need to buy the profile command in order to use it!
profileLocked: The landlubber ye speak of has not looted a profile.
shopFooter: Arrrr, use `+buy <color> role` to loot a color.
noMentionPriv: Ye hornswaggler! Ye can't mention yer private channel!
gameServerMaxLength: Avast! Yer message can't be longer than {length} letters!
gameServerOneLine: Ye can send no more than one line in a message!
pingMessage: Ahoy matey! I be {name}. Me prefix be {prefix}, and ye can use `${prefix}help` to see what I can do!
blacklisted: Yer blacklisted, ye hornswaggler. Ye have no right to use commands.
commandRestrictGameServer: The command ye tried to use can only be used in yon game server.
error: Avast! Something went wrong. The developers have been notified.
voteWhileDead: Ye be thrown overboard, ye can't vote.
gameStarted: The ship has set sail, matey.
spectateDead: Ye be thrown overboard, ye can't watch from the shoreline!
narrateSecondMini: Ye can't be a narrator spectator! The captain is already at the helm!
notNarrator: Only the captain can do this!
joinedLink: {ping}, join yon game using the link above!
alreadyJoined: Ye already joined the game! Check {channel} for the link!
emergencyStop: HIT THE SWAB DECK MATEY, WE'VE HIT LAND TOO HARD! STOP AND CONTACT A DEV ASSISTANT NOW!!!!!! YARRR!!!
questFormatInvalid: Yarrr, ye used the command wrong. Use `+quest <user> <xp> <quest>`!
needUserId: I need a user ID ye landlubber.
xpFormatInvalid: Ye used the command wrong! Use `+xp <add/remove/set> <user> <amount>`!
helpMain:
**__How do ye board the game ship?__**
When the ship is about to set sail, we will warn ye in {gamewarning}. Use the join game button to board the ship.
If ye need to know more, read about how to play in {howtoplay}. The VIP ships will set sail in {rankedwarn}.

If ye have any questions, ask here {supportandquestions}.

Use commands with {clientUser}'s prefix ({prefix}).
helpEconomy:
`shop` Plunder items from merchants!
`daily` Search for buried treasure to find roses, coins, and other treasures!
`inventory` Check your treasure trove to see how many items ye got.
`balance` Check how many doubloons ye got.
`namechange` Change yer pirate title.
`colorchange` Change the color of yer pirate title.
`profile` Check yer exclusive custom-made wanted poster! Ye can plunder one from the merchants in the shop.
`use` Use this command to unlock treasure chests and icons.
`rose` Sends flowers to whoever.
helpFun:
`emoji` use emojis from different servers available from `emojilist`.
`write` Write something with fancy letters and numbers.
`reverse` Reverse yerr sentences.
helpBot:
`settings` Change yer preferred language for most of the bot replies.
`botinfo` Learn more about the bot.
`bug` Report a bug to me dev team!
`suggest` Suggest an improvement for the bot.
`roleinfo` Learn about a role on the ship and how it works.
dailyNotReady: You cannot claim your next daily prize yet! Come back {time}
inviteBadgeUnlocked: Congratulations! You just unlocked the invite badge with the code `{code}`
registeredInvite: Your current registered invite code is `{code}` with **{uses}** uses.
noInviteRegistered:
You don't have any invite registered yet. Register it now using `{usage}`!

The invite can be in any of these formats:
`https://discord.gg/wmY5afT`,
`discord.gg/wmY5afT`,
`wmY5afT`
notOwnInvite: Please use an invite you created!
notSimInvite:
Unable to find invite `{code}`!
Please use an invite from the sim server.
inviteNotResolveable: Can't resolve this invite. Please try again or report this bug.
